remarks: Division of a positive number by both sides of 'less than'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ltdiv2dd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2dd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2dd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2dd.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ltdiv2dd $p |- ( ph -> ( C / B ) < ( C / A ) ) $.
